===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}
# {{lb|zh|archaic}} an [[assistant]] or an [[aide]] to a high ranking officer, who offered both accommodation and pay to the said aide in historic China.
# a staff member of a [[company]] or [[government]] that plays a [[supporting]] role that does not directly generate income for the said organization (e.g. a technician from the IT department of a manufacturing business).
